## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
- [ ] I have added tests for my changes.
- [ ] I have run `pnpm test` and ensured all tests pass.
- [ ] I have run `pnpm lint` and ensured there are no lint errors.
- [ ] I have added a changeset via `pnpm changeset` (if applicable).
